data.title: Sevierville Tennessee Smoky Mountain area Information
data.meta_description: Sevierville Tennessee is a beautiful area in the Smokies filled with interesting attractions, shows, and many fun things to do that you can’t find anywhere else! Sevierville is also the hometown of Grammy Award winning Dolly Parton.
data.text:
Located in the foothills of the Great Smoky National Park.

Sevierville Tennessee is a beautiful area in the Smokies filled with interesting attractions, shows, and many fun things to do that you can’t find anywhere else!

The Sevierville dining experience offers a great range for everyone. From “down home cooking” to international cuisine, as well as casual and on-the–go experiences you will find all of this at the restaurants in Sevierville. There is a variety of franchise restaurants, and also authentic, locally prepared food at many local restaurants. There is so much to enjoy!

For all you baseball fans visiting the Smoky Mountains you can enjoy all the action at Smokies Park, home to the Chicago Cubs AA affiliate, the Tennessee Smokies. Smokies Park is one of the finest minor league baseball stadiums in the country where you and your family can see future major league stars at affordable prices. Great food, great baseball and awesome family fun!
